content.detailedDescription:
I had walked outside to let my dog do his business.

as any other night i looked up at the night sky and something caught my eye that was extremely bright and it was stationary almost directly above me right under a layer of clouds.
the object was mostly white giving off even brighter reds, blues and greens on the fringes of the glowing white light the object was giving off all these colors where extremely crisp and very bright.

i am not sure what the altitude of the cloud deck was but it lower rather than higher and the object was between a dime and an aspirin in size.

i only had the privilege of seeing this object for a few seconds then it shot straight up so fast that i was amazed. i pondered what i thought i saw and what it could have been and i couldn't come up with anything that i see out at my house on a regular basis. i do live about 5 miles from the pittsburgh international airport and see planes all the time and what i saw was nothing like what i see out here on a regular basis.

i did call the sighting in just in case there where any other people seeing anything as well and have heard nothing about it.

i wish i would have had more time to look at what ever it was that i saw. it was very exciting for me and i find myself looking up more now than i ever did.
content.summary: Very bright object (fosforesent) hovered under cloud for a split second then shot straight up.

content.detailedDescription: Setting up my telescope to view saturn and noticed what i thought was a satellite moving ne. suddenly a another light flared into existence in front of the first and the two traveled in tandem until they faded into the ne horizon. it was amazing.
content.summary: 2 starlike objects travelling together

content.detailedDescription: I was in a room upstairs in which there is a window that overlooks sunset cove.  directly across the water, i saw a pinkish-orange ball of light in the night sky.  it was stationary/hovering and its light was reflected in the water.  at first i thought it was a planet, but it seemed too low in the sky for that.  i was a little nervous, as i had never quite seen anything like this in the night sky before.  through my binoculars i noticed that its color was changing from orange to red and back again.  after a while i noticed that it had receded and its light trail in the water had faded, as if it was moving away from me in the exact opposite direction.  i observed this ball of light for about an hour on and off as i moved through the house.  eventually it was gone, but it appeared to have faded into the distance rather than suddenly speeding away.  i made a few phone calls to family members regarding the experience before i filed this report.
content.summary: Hovering ball of pink/orange light that looked like a planet; through binoculars shifted from orange to red.

content.detailedDescription: Please blow up photo
content.summary: Have pics the ufo is in a triangle pattern observed last night as wee

content.detailedDescription: I did not witness the event but it was reported by a state police officer that a glowing green object the size of a whale appeared to descend in the town of morris or bantam at 2 am on the 11th of april, 2012 and another witness from bantam claimed to see the object land in bantam lake.  fire and rescue teams were sent to investigate but found no debris or oil on the small lake and did no further investigation.  the siting was reported on the local news network and in the newspapper.  a meteor the size of a whale should have made enough noise to wake those who live on the lake.  it would be nice to have someone perform an underwater search.  the object was not described as on fire but just glowing.
content.summary: Reported by state police officer from 10 miles away.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading east on i-40 at 9:25pm when i noticed a light in the distance to the north of the interstate.  it was very bright like airplane landing lights.  this location is approx. 10 miles east from tinker afb.  i noticed it was odd because the light was so bright.  as i got closer i saw that it was two lights and did not appear to be moving but i thought that it was likely a plane or helicopter that was just appearing to move slowly.  as i got even closer, i saw that there was a third light and a red flashing light in the middle of a black triangle.  the lights illuminated the bottom side of the triangle which looked smooth.  the object was very stationary and hovering with no sound.  it would have been easy to hear if there was a jet or prop engine or a helicopter because i was simply too close.  i got a bad feeling and did not stop.
content.summary: Black triangle with three white lights on tips and one red flashing light in middle

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting on the outside of my patio (which faces south) with my best friend watching for satellites like i do most nights. between 7:50 and 8:30pm. i saw 9 satellites (a personal best) 2 headed north, 5 headed south, 2 headed southeast and 2 shooting stars. (i was facing east with my head laying on the back of my chair.) at 8:50 i saw 2 bright lights coming from the southwest going overhead northeast so fast that by the time i jumped out of my chair ,(pointing at them with both hands so my friend might see them.) walked about three steps the lights were out of sight. my friend did not see them. the lights were to the side of each other with the left one passing the right one. the left one slowed down really fast and the right one passed a little bit. then the left one started going faster enough to pass the right one by a short distance and maintained the same speed slightly ahead of the right one. both lights were solid white with no glow around then and more then four times the size of mars with the naked eye. they were moving so fast i didn't even have time to grab my cell phone and when my friend jumped up to look they were out of sight that fast. wow....
content.summary: Two solid white lights moving faster then anything i've seen before.

content.detailedDescription: Somthing crashed in the canyons west of spring creek and was recovered by a team of unknown origin . tree tops were broken ground was burned , when it crashed the sky lit up for a few seconds. three green lights in a triangular shape came down at 45 degree angle with sparks emitting from the back . send someone or team and i will take them to the site
content.summary: Triangular green lights crashing at a 45 degree angle with sparks emitting from the back

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i had gotten back from work late at night and were up in our kitchen on the 8th floor in washington heights. we opened the window to enjoy the clear crisp night and we just admiring the view of downtown manhattan. washington heights is higher up and so we had a view of the length of manhattan, plus our building was higher then the others to the south. we were chatting near the window, and then i saw a v formation coming towards us, and at first i thought it was a flock of geese, and my husband and i saw at the same time that they were disks. they were moving very swiftly, made no sound and had no lights. the only way that we were seeing them was that the bottoms were lit up by the city lights. the disks were black looking against the dark sky, but had a rusty orange color, mixed with diffused light. there were three on one side and two on the other (counting the leader of the v). we yelled excitedly and ran for the door to run up to the roof, calling to my father to follow us. the roof was three more flights up. when we got out, it was harder to see them but they had picked up an extra one and were heading back down the length of manhattan until we could no longer see them. up on the roof, there was more light shining up from the street lights, and the colors of the ufo's blended into the dark sky. i went up on the roof days after that to see whether we'd catch them again, and we didn't see those again. i think i may have tried to report it to the newspaper and they did not want to take the story. everything happened so fast and it was before digital cameras, cell phones, etc., where we could have recorded it. my husband and i were not on drugs nor drinking, as it is strictly against the rules of where we were working. we both felt happy that we had seen them together. we were thrilled.
content.summary: Looking out of 8th story window upper manhattan, saw v formation, thought they were geese coming our way, then we saw they were disks, they made no sound, had no lights, traveling very fast, we ran up to the roof and saw them going back down manhattan.

content.detailedDescription: I had arrived home from the grocery store in valier, mt.  had my 3 kids with me and we were just unloading groceries from back of my van.  i turned and noticed orange lights coming over the canola field to the east of us, headed directly towards us.  the lights were what drew my attention.  it came towards us and passed over the top of us in seconds.  no sound at all.  both my middle son and i ran as fast as we could down our driveway to the road, as we had very tall pines as a windbreak around our house to the north and west.  at the last second as it passed over us i saw it turn to the north.  when we reached the end of the driveway, maybe 75 feet, it was gone.  it was bullet shaped but wider at the back.  i remember the lights were underneath and also some other objects, not sure, seemed like some kind of piping or support.  i was so fast and silent, it was hard to see exactly.  but it was not a plane, maybe a 100 ft off the ground and silent.  not shaped like a helicopter at all.  definately not a weather ballon.  to this day i don't know what it was only that it fits the true definition of a ufo.  i would love to know if any one else saw this object as my son and i still talk about it.  my other two boys didn't notice it as they were slow getting out of the car, but david, who was only 7 still remembers the same thing as i did.  it's given him an interest for life!!!  seen other unexplainable things too (at least to us), like flashes in space like someone took a flash photo.  but very interesting.  this happened probably in early 1996.
content.summary: Arrived home with kids, saw bright light across field headed towards us.

content.detailedDescription: It was a bright sunny day. i had recently talked to my mom about the difference in contrails and chemtrails. told her what i had learned. well one day she noticed in the sky 3 very long and large chemtrails and just so happened to be an airplane in the distance demostrating a contrail. after uploading her pictures she also noticed the glowing orb or ufo. it's too difficult to jump to the conclusion that it's reflected light or that it's an actual object. she said it happened in an instant. you be the judge.
content.summary: My mother was taking pictures of chemtrails and a contrail when she noticed something...

content.detailedDescription: Salia del trabajo mirando al cielo vi pasar de sur a norte una cuadrilla de ovnis aproximadamente 15 o 20 en forma de ovnis de destellos tenues
content.summary: Flotilla de 20 aproximadamente de ovnis

content.detailedDescription: We observed two bright orange glowing objects in the sky while we were in the car.  first, for 2 seconds just one ufo was present and it moved a bit lower and suddenly disappeared.Then a second ufo of the same colour and size appeared a few meters right to the previous one and it hovered straight where the previous one was.  it moved at incredible speed, following a semi-circle direction and then it looked as if it was absorbed.  they both disappeared.  the event occured for appr. 1 minute.  it's the bright unusal colour that made us notice the objects.  once i saw them i insisted that they were ufo's.  i felt a bit shocked and scared because once we noticed the objects, i yelled that they looked like they were ufo's and pointed at them and immidiately the first disappeared.  we lost sight of the objects as they disappeared.
content.summary: 2 orange glowing objects moving

content.detailedDescription: While out walking the dogs down the see font (seaton carew), i seen a large bright light moving , i thought at first it was venus , but this one was moving from west to east , i stopped next to a lamp post and watched this object come straight over head, still this bright light , then thought it must be the landing light of an aircraft or helicopter spot light ... but no noise, this light never got dull , as watched it move over my head , i could hear the lamp post start to shake, as though there was wind , but i couldn't feel any , as it moved slowly away to the east i could see a second light a lot higher up and smaller which moved in the same direction , gutted i never had my mobile and guess no one else around , this all happened in a 5 minute period
content.summary: Northeast coast bright light west to east

content.detailedDescription: Filming chemtrails and noticed objects in sky.
content.summary: Filming chemtrails objects flying.

content.detailedDescription:
On monday april 16, 2012 at 8:25pm (et) i was standing outside on my roof. many nights i sit on my roof, gazing at the sky. immediately after going outside, i looked up and within seconds, noticed two star-like objects gliding across the sky. the two dots appeared to be flying together; the distance between the two remained constant during my observation. they were flying slightly in an upward direction. their altitude appeared to be extremely high. i observed the objects flying for roughly 20 seconds. after, they simply disappeared. 
it was not a cloudy night. in fact, there was zero cloud coverage in the portion of the sky i was viewing. i was able to immediately rule out commercial airplanes and other crafts that frequent the sky where i live. 
this same night, there were also another incident i witnessed (all before 8:35pm). 
i saw another star-like object flying at a very high altitude. its' light didn't appear particularly bright (comparable to a dim star), however for about a 5 second period, the light swelled and grew brighter (the object got larger). then the light returned to its original brightness and i viewed it until it became too far away for me to see.
content.summary: 2 star-like lights, high in the sky, flying for a brief time before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Lights danced right at dusk.  changed direction very abruptly.  event lasted for 30-45 minutes.  video was taken over the top of a nearby house toward the city of wilmington, nc from wrightsville beach.
content.summary: Two lights, changing colors from white to green to blue danced far away.  there was no sound

content.detailedDescription: Lights danced right at dusk.  changed direction very abruptly.  event lasted for 30-45 minutes.  video was taken over the top of a nearby house toward the city of wilmington, nc from wrightsville beach.
content.summary: Two lights, changing colors from white to green to blue danced far away.  there was no sound

content.detailedDescription: It was just about dark when the first object was videoed by me and no other objects were in sight. as soon as it got dark about a dozen objects appeared and when some of them started to come closer to the ground is when the helicopters came. the helicopters seemed to be protecting them and clearing a path. i saw 2 helicopters and there were several planes flying in concert with them.
content.summary: After sending the first report on 4/17/12 about 20 minutes later helicopters buzzed the house and seemed to be protecting the craft

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend went out onto the rear deck of our home to smoke a cigarette and i followed her out shortly before 10:30pm.  our deck is covered with a gazebo so she did not see anything but i do alot of star gazing being that i am into astronomy.  i was looking around the sky when right almost directly over head there was a very bright light.  the light was about 3 times brighter than venus and it took me a minute to realize that venus was further west of my location so i watched this light for about 20 seconds then it slowly went faded to a very dim red color until it went completely out of sight.  the object was not moving at all and it was so bright that you could see the rays of light filter through the light cloud cover that was present.  there were aircraft in the area and this seemed to be at almost the same altitude as they were. this was not any satellite or aircraft and it was not the space station being as it was not moving at all. i do not think this was any kind of meteor either due to its stationary position. i would guess it was about 10 degrees southeast of my zenith position and i was facing east.
content.summary: Stationary bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was driving out of my complex, which is located high up in the hills of la mesa, when i spotted an object in the sw skies.  i see planes coming in all the time, and this was no plane.  it was just hovering above the tree tops in the distance.  i pulled my car over to try and get a better look and it started to move very slowly.  twice it kind of rotated to a 45 degree angle, hovered like that, then it straightened back out and kept up it's crawling pace.  it was not shaped like a plane, but rather like a blimp or a cigar.  it was so far away i was having a hard time watching it, really.  that being said, the planes that were coming in, and there were at least four that passed as i watched, were much closer in proximity to me, and this object at it's far-off distance appeared to be the same size.  so it must have been huge.  anyways, i tried taking three pics of this thing and i'll be damned if it barely showed up in just one photograph... and by barely i mean i had to zoom in and crop it for a while before i finally found it - and it doesn't look like anything spectacular, therefore i have not included it.  now, it could very well have been a blimp, i have no clue, but do blimps rotate at 45 degree angles and hover?  i would like to know this... and i looked on the internet to see if i could find anything about blimps flying over san diego and i couldn't find anything.  this is my second sighting of something unusual in exactly 7 days... i have never seen a ufo, now i have seen two in just a week... i don't know.  please help.
content.summary: Grayish colored, blimp/cigar-shaped object seen in the sw skies in full daylight

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my girlfriend home to warren nh from north woodstock nh at aprox. 1 am.  we were on route 118 a very old and remote road with little to no traffic at that time of night. we were travelling in a southwesternly direction and had just crested the height of land and was beginning the decent into the warren area valley. the road has many sharp twists and turns, i was used to driving the road at night was was travelling at a speed of aprox. 40 mph. my girlfriend had fallen asleep.

suddenly, as i rounded a curve, i saw a sharply defined object (diamond shaped with a flat top very similar in shape to a cute diamond such as one that would be used to set into a ring. i was glowing in what i can only describe as a muted greenish orange color.  while illuminating the object itself very clearly the light did not cause any sort of beam or glow, the edges of the object were visible and very sharply delimited. the object did not appear to be moving at all or making any noise. the object dominated the night sky which was cloudless with no moon.  at first i thought the object must be the moon, but the shape and color soon caused me to dismiss that possibility.  the object seemed very large, taking up to one quarter of the night sky that was visible through my windshield.  because the road in very narrow and there is no place to turn off the road safely, i continued to drive, but slowed down considerably to continue observing the object.  i was able to keep the object in view for about 30 - 45 seconds before losing sight of it due to a sharp dip in the road.  when i rounded the next curve, i caught a quick (10 seconds at most) of the top part of the object with trees and part of the mountain visible in front of it.  after that i saw no more of the object, but continued driving slowly, hoping to get a better look at it,

i was startled by girlfriend asking me "what are you looking " from the passenger side of the truck.  i said something like "oh nothing" and started to pick up speed a bit.  then my girlfriend said " are you looking for the ufo?". "did you see it too?" i said, surprised that she had been awake and had seen what i say.  i had her describe what she saw and it coincided with what i have described here. i should mention here that my girlfriend was very much a skeptic on the topic of ufos and for her to confirm what we saw is significant evidence of the veracity of the event.

i had been keenly interested in ufo earlier in my life, but at this time had not been actively interested for close to a decade. i had pretty much filed ufos under "well, i just don't know what the heck is going on." and had let it rest at that.

at any rate, i dropped my girlfriend off and drove back to north woodstock over the same road we had seen the ufo on and did not see anything on the way home.  my interest in the ufo phenomena has been rekindled in the last couple of years and i wanted to get an account of what we saw that last fall night. over 20 years ago.
thanks for reading this.
content.summary: Saw diamond shaped with flattened top shaped ufo hovering/stationary at treetop level on remote mountain road.

content.detailedDescription:
Long story, we have been seeing them a lot.

to long of a story to tell here... but craft communicated to us. we see mostly triangles, and this one (not a triangle) that communicated to us in the field.

i have video of first contact (summer of 2011), but just lights show up on actual footage.

i have seen them as close as under 30 feet... seen the pilot (humaniod) sitting in the front of the triangles.

much activity.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft flew at us, then almost landed, no noise, no wings, at dusk.

content.detailedDescription:
Long story, we have been seeing them a lot.

to long of a story to tell here... but craft communicated to us. we see mostly triangles, and this one (not a triangle) that communicated to us in the field.

i have video of first contact (summer of 2011), but just lights show up on actual footage.

i have seen them as close as under 30 feet... seen the pilot (humaniod) sitting in the front of the triangles.

much activity.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Craft flew at us, then almost landed, no noise, no wings, at dusk.

content.detailedDescription:
Went out on front porch of house to have cigarette at approx 11:50pm on 4/17.  noticed very bright light through trees directly behind me.  my first reaction was that it was a planet (though it did not have the characteristic "twinkle")  observed object remaining static for around 2 minutes through trees, then repositioned myself in back yard to see object unobstructed.  object remained still for several more minutes, then began to track east, very slowly at constant altitude.  object again appeared to stop, then track the opposite direction (west).  this occurred within the span of roughly 5 minutes.  intensity, shape, and color of object appeared to remain constant throughout.  at this point, i got in my car to reposition myself once again, following it toward the auburn auction park from leo area.  at this point, i could see the object clearly, and it appeared to be moving away from me in a west heading.  i continued to follow the object through laotto on highway 205, at this point, it appeared to be north and west of my position on the highway.  i maintained intermittent view of the object when trees did not obstruct.  i lost sight of the object about 5 miles before reaching churubusco.  last sighting was at approximately 12:30am, somewhere on 205 between laotto and churubusco.

during road pursuit, flight path of object was difficult to judge, but the object was remarkably brighter, lower, and more "yellow/orange" than other aircraft i had observed in the sky.

what struck me about the object was the intensity of the light.  it did not flicker, pulse, or display any other observable color than white/yellow/orange.  i've lived under airports and been near aircraft landing patterns all my life and have never observed anything like this.
content.summary: Bright orange/white orb at tree level in vicinity of garrett/laotto area

content.detailedDescription:
in oklahoma city  4-17-12 at around 1:00 am i saw something i've never seen before.    here is my best description of the sighting.

      i was outside having a smoke before going to bed when something caught my peripheral vision, at first it looked like a huge bird gliding but it was a craft that looked somewhat triangular,  best i could tell.  it made absolutely no audible sound, nothing, dead quiet.  i would guess it was anywhere from 300 ft -500 ft high, was flying very low and fairly slow.  it looked as though it was gliding or floating effortlessly.     a couple of things that really threw me were, the two lights, one on each wing tip, looked as though you were shining a light thru a dense fog or haze, there wasn't a cloud in the sky, the lights did not look vivid or stark in contrast like you would normally see on a aircraft, these had a sort of cloudy glow to them.   misty looking is a good description and possibly why the craft itself looked cloaked or almost transparent to me, although, i could vaguely make out a triangle shape it was not necessarily definitive as such, it also made it hard to judge altitude and size of the craft.   my best guess as to the size of the craft would be roughly  40ft -80ft in width and it seemed wider than it was in length.  the sighting only lasted maybe 10 seconds, my back was to the craft and i didn't see it approaching.  i did not see it until it was right above me.  it disappeared very quickly and not by speed, almost as though someone turned out the lights.  i was not able to visually track it like you can a normal aircraft on a crystal clear night.  it took me a few minutes to process what i saw, 

      my gut feeling is that this is military and not a alien craft,  whatever the technology was that i saw, it has definitely not been made public.     tinker af base is fairly close and the flight path was similar to other craft i have seen in the past.
content.summary: Silent black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were walking our dog about 7:40 pm when she noticed an object
heading towards us. she at first thought it was the police helicopter but
when i looked it did not have a white light. instead, it appeared to be on fire with a red, orange and yellow glow. we stopped for 5 minutes to watch it as it approached. as it got closer (still a few miles away) we could see that the glow was pulsing those same colors. it made no noise as it moved. it then hovered and began to slowly ascend. as it did so, the object began to slowly fade and then vanished entirely.
content.summary: Wife and i walking dog when noticed object coming towards us from south

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east when i saw 2 dim reddish orange lights. i thought it was an airplane getting ready to land but then one of the lights turned off and seconds later the other light turned off, the second light turned back on about 10 seconds later only to turn back off about a second later. when i got home i decided to scan the sky when i saw and airplane and what i thought to be another airplane. the object that i thought was an airplane started to strobe and appeared to be very fast when another object appeared next to it and was also strobing. the second object became behind the first object and a third one appeared behind the second one. all three were flying in a straight line to the east and kept going straight. i called a friend and told her to go outside and she said she could only see one object and that it appeared to be going up into the sky and said it dissappeared about 3 minutes later.
content.summary: 3 strobe like lights in straight line going west. i saw them outside of my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette. i was facing south and noticed the light. i thought it was an airplane at first. it seemed to approach very quickly. as it got closer i noticed only one flashing white light on it. i heard no sound from any jet engine. it was close enough to be able to hear it and it was a relatively quiet evening. ambient noise from the freeway a half mile away. not enough sound to drown out noise from a jet aircraft. i looked closer and noticed it did not have the flashing red and green faa lights as are required on commercial and military aircraft. in under a minute it had passed over the hills just north of me. judging by it's speed, i concluded that whatever it was, was not propeller driven. in the approx 45 seconds i had witnessed it, it had covered a distance of 15 miles. that gives the object an estimated speed of 1200 mph.
content.summary: Bright light with single flashing white light. very high speed. moving north

content.detailedDescription: Initially noticed a cocoon of light that went out after ramping and then watched the boomerang with red lights under the wings.
content.summary: Equal phoenix arizona
